ADM_LOS_DAYS: Length of stay in the index hospital admission in days.
ADM_YEAR: Calendar year of this admission; treat as a small temporal effect, don’t emphasize the exact number.
ADM_IS_ELECTIVE: Indicator that the index admission type was elective.
ADM_IS_EMERGENCY: Indicator that the index admission type was emergency.
ADM_IS_URGENT: Indicator that the index admission type was urgent.
ADM_IS_CURRENTLYMARRIED: Indicator that the patient was recorded as currently married.
PAT_AGE_AT_ADMIT: Patient age (in years) at the time of the index admission.
PAT_IS_ELDERLY: Indicator that the patient meets the project’s elderly age threshold (e.g., ≥65 years).
ICU_N_STAYS: Number of distinct ICU stays during the index hospital admission.
ICU_READMIT_WITHIN_ADM: Indicator that the patient was readmitted to ICU within the same hospital admission.
ICU_TOTAL_LOS_DAYS: Total length of stay (in days) across all ICU stays in the index admission.
ICU_MAX_LOS_DAYS: Maximum length of stay (in days) for any single ICU stay in the index admission.
ICU_ANY: Indicator that the patient was admitted to an ICU during the hospital stay.
ICU_HOURS_TO_FIRST_FROM_ADMIT: Hours from hospital admission to the start of the first ICU stay.
TR_N_STOPS: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: n stops.
TR_N_TRANSFERS: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: n transfers.
TR_N_UNIQUE_UNITS: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: n unique units.
TR_N_ICU_STOPS: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: n icu stops.
TR_ANY_ICU_UNIT: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: any icu unit.
TR_HOURS_TO_FIRST_FROM_ADMIT: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: hours to first from admit.
TR_HOURS_LAST_TO_DISCH: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: hours last to disch.
TR_TRANSFERS_PER_DAY: Transfer-related metric derived from movement between units: transfers per day.
DX_CHF: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'CHF' (Congestive Heart Failure): 1 if heart failure diagnoses (e.g., systolic, diastolic, or combined) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_CARIT: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'CARIT' (Cardiac Arrhythmias): 1 if arrhythmia diagnoses (e.g., atrial fibrillation, flutter, ventricular arrhythmias) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_VALV: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'VALV' (Valvular Disease): 1 if cardiac valve disorders (e.g., mitral, aortic, tricuspid valve disease) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_PCD: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'PCD' (Pulmonary Circulation Disorders): 1 if pulmonary vascular conditions (e.g., pulmonary hypertension, pulmonary embolism) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_PVD: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'PVD' (Peripheral Vascular Disease): 1 if peripheral arterial or vascular disease diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_HYPUNC: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'HYPUNC' (Hypertension, Uncomplicated): 1 if uncomplicated hypertension diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_HYPC: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'HYPC' (Hypertension, Complicated): 1 if hypertension with end-organ complications (e.g., renal, cardiac, or cerebrovascular involvement) was present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_PARA: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'PARA' (Paralysis): 1 if paralysis diagnoses (e.g., hemiplegia, paraplegia, quadriplegia) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_OND: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'OND' (Other Neurological Disorders): 1 if chronic neurological conditions (e.g., epilepsy, Parkinson’s disease, multiple sclerosis) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_CPD: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'CPD' (Chronic Pulmonary Disease): 1 if chronic respiratory diseases (e.g., COPD, chronic bronchitis, emphysema, asthma) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_DIABUNC: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'DIABUNC' (Diabetes, Uncomplicated): 1 if diabetes mellitus without documented complications was present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_DIABC: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'DIABC' (Diabetes, Complicated): 1 if diabetes mellitus with complications (e.g., nephropathy, neuropathy, retinopathy) was present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_HYPOTHY: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'HYPOTHY' (Hypothyroidism): 1 if hypothyroid disorders were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_RF: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'RF' (Renal Failure): 1 if acute or chronic renal failure diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_LD: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'LD' (Liver Disease): 1 if liver disorders (e.g., cirrhosis, chronic hepatitis, hepatic failure) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_PUD: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'PUD' (Peptic Ulcer Disease, excluding bleeding): 1 if peptic ulcer disease without acute bleeding was present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_AIDS: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'AIDS' (Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome): 1 if HIV/AIDS diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_LYMPH: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'LYMPH' (Lymphoma): 1 if lymphoma or related hematologic malignancies were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_METACANC: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'METACANC' (Metastatic Cancer): 1 if metastatic solid tumor diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_SOLIDTUM: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'SOLIDTUM' (Solid Tumor without Metastasis): 1 if non-metastatic solid malignancies were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_RHEUMD: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'RHEUMD' (Rheumatoid Arthritis / Collagen Vascular Diseases): 1 if autoimmune or connective tissue disorders were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_COAG: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'COAG' (Coagulopathy): 1 if coagulation disorders (e.g., thrombocytopenia, clotting factor deficiencies) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_OBES: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'OBES' (Obesity): 1 if obesity or morbid obesity diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_WLOSS: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'WLOSS' (Weight Loss): 1 if clinically significant weight loss or cachexia diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_FED: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'FED' (Fluid and Electrolyte Disorders): 1 if fluid, electrolyte, or acid–base disturbances were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_BLANE: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'BLANE' (Blood Loss Anemia): 1 if anemia due to acute or chronic blood loss was present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_DANE: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'DANE' (Deficiency Anemia): 1 if nutritional or deficiency-related anemia diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_ALCOHOL: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'ALCOHOL' (Alcohol Abuse): 1 if alcohol use disorder or alcohol-related diagnoses were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_DRUG: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'DRUG' (Drug Abuse): 1 if substance or drug use disorders (excluding alcohol) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_PSYCHO: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'PSYCHO' (Psychoses): 1 if psychotic disorders (e.g., schizophrenia, schizoaffective disorder) were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_DEPRE: Diagnosis comorbidity flag 'DEPRE' (Depression): 1 if depressive disorders were present during the index admission, 0 otherwise.
DX_ELIX_VW_SCORE: Elixhauser comorbidity van Walraven weighted summary score derived from ICD-9 diagnoses, where higher values indicate greater overall comorbidity burden.
DX_ELIX_N_FLAGS: Total number of distinct Elixhauser comorbidity flags present for the patient during the index admission.
DX_ELIX_ANY: Indicator that at least one Elixhauser comorbidity diagnosis was present during the index admission.
PRC_N_ROWS: Total number of ICD-9 procedure code records associated with the admission, reflecting overall procedural burden.
PRC_N_UNIQUE: Number of distinct ICD-9 procedure types recorded during the admission, reflecting procedural diversity.
PRC_MECH_VENT: Indicator for invasive mechanical ventilation procedures (e.g., prolonged ventilatory support via endotracheal tube or tracheostomy).
PRC_INTUBATION: Indicator for endotracheal intubation procedures performed to secure the airway.
PRC_TRACHEOSTOMY: Indicator for surgical tracheostomy placement for prolonged airway management.
PRC_ENTERAL_NUTRITION: Indicator for enteral feeding procedures, including nasogastric, gastrostomy, or jejunostomy feeding.
PRC_TRANSFUSION: Indicator for blood product transfusion procedures, including packed red cells, plasma, or platelets.
PRC_DIALYSIS: Indicator for renal replacement therapy procedures, including hemodialysis or continuous renal replacement therapy.
PRC_CENTRAL_LINE: Indicator for central venous catheter insertion for medication delivery or hemodynamic monitoring.
PRC_ART_LINE: Indicator for arterial line insertion for continuous blood pressure monitoring or blood sampling.
PRC_HEMO_MONITOR: Indicator for invasive hemodynamic monitoring procedures (e.g., Swan–Ganz catheterization).
PRC_CABG: Indicator for coronary artery bypass graft surgery.
PRC_VALVE_REPLACE: Indicator for cardiac valve replacement or repair procedures.
PRC_EXTRACORP_CIRC: Indicator for extracorporeal circulation procedures, including cardiopulmonary bypass.
PRC_CARDIOPLEGIA_HYPOTH: Indicator for cardioplegia or induced hypothermia during cardiac surgery.
PRC_BALLOON_PUMP: Indicator for intra-aortic balloon pump placement for circulatory support.
PRC_HEART_ASSIST: Indicator for mechanical cardiac assist device procedures (e.g., ventricular assist devices).
PRC_CARDIAC_DEVICE: Indicator for implantation or management of cardiac rhythm or assist devices (e.g., pacemaker, ICD).
PRC_RESUSCITATION: Indicator for cardiopulmonary resuscitation or advanced life support procedures.
PRC_PCI: Indicator for percutaneous coronary intervention procedures (e.g., angioplasty or stent placement).
PRC_CORONARY_OTHER: Indicator for other coronary artery procedures not classified as PCI or CABG.
PRC_CORONARY_ANGIO: Indicator for diagnostic coronary angiography procedures.
PRC_CARDIAC_CATH: Indicator for cardiac catheterization procedures for diagnostic or therapeutic purposes.
PRC_PERICARDIAL_PROC: Indicator for pericardial procedures (e.g., pericardiocentesis or pericardial window).
PRC_VASC_ENDO_OPEN: Indicator for open or endovascular vascular surgical procedures.
PRC_VASC_ACCESS_REPAIR: Indicator for vascular access creation or repair procedures (e.g., AV fistula revision).
PRC_VASC_GEN: Indicator for general vascular surgical procedures.
PRC_VENA_CAVA: Indicator for inferior or superior vena cava procedures (e.g., IVC filter placement).
PRC_UMBIL_VEIN_CATH: Indicator for umbilical vein catheterization procedures (primarily neonatal).
PRC_VASC_DIAGNOSTIC: Indicator for diagnostic vascular imaging or exploration procedures.
PRC_CHEST_TUBE: Indicator for chest tube insertion for pleural drainage.
PRC_THORACENTESIS: Indicator for thoracentesis procedures to remove pleural fluid.
PRC_PLEURAL_THORAX_OP: Indicator for pleural or thoracic surgical operations.
PRC_TRACHEAL_ENDO_REP: Indicator for tracheal or endotracheal repair procedures.
PRC_BRONCHOSCOPY: Indicator for diagnostic or therapeutic bronchoscopy procedures.
PRC_EVD_SHUNT: Indicator for external ventricular drain or cerebrospinal fluid shunt placement.
PRC_MENINGES_CRANIAL: Indicator for cranial or meningeal surgical procedures.
PRC_NEURO_IOM: Indicator for intraoperative neurophysiological monitoring procedures.
PRC_SPINAL_TAP: Indicator for lumbar puncture (spinal tap) procedures.
PRC_ENDO_GI_HEMOSTASIS: Indicator for endoscopic gastrointestinal hemostasis procedures.
PRC_STOMA_CREATE_CLOSE: Indicator for creation or closure of gastrointestinal stomas (e.g., colostomy, ileostomy).
PRC_BOWEL_ANAST_REPAIR: Indicator for bowel anastomosis creation or repair.
PRC_LAPAROTOMY: Indicator for open abdominal exploratory surgery (laparotomy).
PRC_GI_MAJOR: Indicator for major gastrointestinal surgical procedures.
PRC_GB_ASP: Indicator for gallbladder aspiration or drainage procedures.
PRC_PEG_GJ: Indicator for percutaneous endoscopic gastrostomy with gastrojejunostomy extension (PEG-J) placement.
PRC_TRANSPLANT: Indicator for solid organ transplant procedures.
PRC_URO_ACCESS: Indicator for urinary tract access procedures.
PRC_ILEOURETER: Indicator for ileoureteral diversion or reconstruction procedures.
PRC_JOINT_REPLACE: Indicator for joint replacement surgery (e.g., hip or knee arthroplasty).
PRC_FX_FIX_DEVICE: Indicator for fracture fixation device placement.
PRC_BONE_EXC_GRAFT: Indicator for bone excision or bone grafting procedures.
PRC_SOFT_GRAFT: Indicator for soft tissue grafting procedures.
PRC_WOUND_CARE: Indicator for wound care or debridement procedures.
PRC_ABD_REPAIR: Indicator for abdominal wall repair procedures.
PRC_RESP_LAVAGE: Indicator for respiratory tract lavage procedures.
PRC_INTEST_RECTAL_TUBE: Indicator for intestinal or rectal tube placement.
PRC_PLASMA_LEUKA_PHOTO: Indicator for plasma exchange, leukapheresis, or photopheresis procedures.
PRC_INHALED_NO: Indicator for inhaled nitric oxide therapy.
PRC_OXY_NEB: Indicator for oxygen or nebulized respiratory therapy.
PRC_COUNSELING: Indicator for counseling or behavioral therapy procedures.
PRC_FB_AIRWAY: Indicator for foreign body removal from the airway.
PRC_FB_ESOPH: Indicator for foreign body removal from the esophagus.
PRC_EPISTAXIS: Indicator for procedures to control epistaxis (nosebleed).
PRC_ICU_SUPPORT_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'icu support' was performed.
PRC_ICU_SUPPORT_N: Count of procedures in the category 'icu support' during the index admission.
PRC_CARDIAC_PROC_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'cardiac proc' was performed.
PRC_CARDIAC_PROC_N: Count of procedures in the category 'cardiac proc' during the index admission.
PRC_CORONARY_CATH_EP_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'coronary cath ep' was performed.
PRC_CORONARY_CATH_EP_N: Count of procedures in the category 'coronary cath ep' during the index admission.
PRC_VASCULAR_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'vascular' was performed.
PRC_VASCULAR_N: Count of procedures in the category 'vascular' during the index admission.
PRC_THORAX_RESP_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'thorax resp' was performed.
PRC_THORAX_RESP_N: Count of procedures in the category 'thorax resp' during the index admission.
PRC_NEURO_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'neuro' was performed.
PRC_NEURO_N: Count of procedures in the category 'neuro' during the index admission.
PRC_GI_GENERAL_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'gi general' was performed.
PRC_GI_GENERAL_N: Count of procedures in the category 'gi general' during the index admission.
PRC_GU_URO_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'gu uro' was performed.
PRC_GU_URO_N: Count of procedures in the category 'gu uro' during the index admission.
PRC_ORTHO_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'ortho' was performed.
PRC_ORTHO_N: Count of procedures in the category 'ortho' during the index admission.
PRC_WOUND_SKIN_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'wound skin' was performed.
PRC_WOUND_SKIN_N: Count of procedures in the category 'wound skin' during the index admission.
PRC_TUBES_LAVAGE_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'tubes lavage' was performed.
PRC_TUBES_LAVAGE_N: Count of procedures in the category 'tubes lavage' during the index admission.
PRC_THERAPIES_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'therapies' was performed.
PRC_THERAPIES_N: Count of procedures in the category 'therapies' during the index admission.
PRC_FB_ENT_ANY: Indicator that at least one procedure in the category 'fb ent' was performed.
PRC_FB_ENT_N: Count of procedures in the category 'fb ent' during the index admission.
PRC_ANY: Indicator that at least one ICD-9 procedure was recorded during the admission.
PRC_TOTAL_CHILD_HITS: Total number of procedure category matches across all defined procedure groupings during the admission.
RX_N_ROWS: Total number of medication administration records during the admission.
RX_N_UNIQUE_DRUGS: Number of unique drugs prescribed during the index admission.
RX_MEAN_DURATION_DAYS: Average duration (in days) of each prescribed drug course.
RX_TOTAL_DAYS: Total sum of all medication days (across all drugs) during the admission.
RX_HAS_OVERLAP: Indicator that there were overlapping medication courses (multiple drugs taken concurrently).
RX_POLYPHARMACY: Indicator for polypharmacy (many concurrent medications) based on project-defined threshold.
RX_DRUGS_PER_DAY: Average number of distinct drugs active per day during the admission.
MICRO_N_ROWS: Total number of microbiology culture records during the admission.
MICRO_N_POSITIVE: Number of microbiology cultures recorded as positive.
MICRO_HAS_INFECTION: Indicator that at least one microbiology record suggested infection.
LAB_BLOOD_ANION_GAP_MEQ_L: Blood laboratory measurement: anion gap meq/l.
LAB_URINE_UROBILINOGEN_EU_DL: Urine laboratory measurement: urobilinogen eu dl.
LAB_BLOOD_CALCIUM_TOTAL_MG_DL: Blood laboratory measurement: calcium total mg/dl.
LAB_BLOOD_CREATINE_KINASE_MB_ISOENZYME_N: Blood laboratory measurement: creatine kinase mb isoenzyme ng/ml.
LAB_BLOOD_SODIUM_WHOLE_BLOOD_MEQ_L: Blood laboratory measurement: sodium whole blood meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_RETICULOCYTE_COUNT_AUTOMATED: Blood laboratory measurement: reticulocyte count automated.
LAB_BLOOD_RED_BLOOD_CELLS_M_UL: Blood laboratory measurement: red blood cells m/µl.
LAB_BLOOD_LACTATE_DEHYDROGENASE_LD_IU_L: Blood laboratory measurement: lactate dehydrogenase ld iu/l.
LAB_BLOOD_BILIRUBIN_TOTAL_MG_DL: Blood laboratory measurement: bilirubin total mg/dl.
LAB_BLOOD_WHITE_BLOOD_CELLS_K_UL: Blood laboratory measurement: white blood cells k/µl.
LAB_BLOOD_PO2_MM_HG: Blood laboratory measurement: po2 mm hg.
LAB_BLOOD_ALVEOLAR_ARTERIAL_GRADIENT: Blood laboratory measurement: alveolar arterial gradient.
LAB_BLOOD_ALKALINE_PHOSPHATASE_IU_L: Blood laboratory measurement: alkaline phosphatase iu/l.
LAB_BLOOD_FREE_CALCIUM_MMOL_L: Blood laboratory measurement: free calcium mmol/l.
LAB_BLOOD_CHLORIDE_WHOLE_BLOOD_MEQ_L: Blood laboratory measurement: chloride whole blood meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_PLATELET_COUNT_K_UL: Blood laboratory measurement: platelet count k/µl.
LAB_BLOOD_VANCOMYCIN_UG_ML: Blood laboratory measurement: vancomycin ug ml.
LAB_BLOOD_CALCULATED_TOTAL_CO2_MEQ_L: Blood laboratory measurement: calculated total co2 meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_UREA_NITROGEN_MG_DL: Blood laboratory measurement: urea nitrogen mg/dl.
LAB_URINE_UREA_NITROGEN_URINE_MG_DL: Urine laboratory measurement: urea nitrogen urine mg/dl.
LAB_BLOOD_IRON_BINDING_CAPACITY_TOTAL_UG: Blood laboratory measurement: iron binding capacity total ug/dl.
LAB_URINE_HYALINE_CASTS_LPF: Urine laboratory measurement: hyaline casts lpf.
LAB_BLOOD_BILIRUBIN_DIRECT_MG_DL: Blood laboratory measurement: bilirubin direct mg/dl.
LAB_BLOOD_ASPARATE_AMINOTRANSFERASE_AST_: Blood laboratory measurement: asparate aminotransferase ast iu/l.
LAB_BLOOD_ALANINE_AMINOTRANSFERASE_ALT_I: Blood laboratory measurement: alanine aminotransferase alt iu/l.
LAB_BLOOD_PCO2_MM_HG: Blood laboratory measurement: pco2 mm hg.
LAB_BLOOD_TROPONIN_T_NG_ML: Blood laboratory measurement: troponin t ng/ml.
LAB_BLOOD_THYROID_STIMULATING_HORMONE_UI: Blood laboratory measurement: thyroid stimulating hormone µiu/ml.
LAB_URINE_OSMOLALITY_URINE_MOSM_KG: Urine laboratory measurement: osmolality urine mosm kg.
LAB_BLOOD_BILIRUBIN_INDIRECT_MG_DL: Blood laboratory measurement: bilirubin indirect mg/dl.
LAB_BLOOD_POTASSIUM_WHOLE_BLOOD_MEQ_L: Blood laboratory measurement: potassium whole blood meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_O2_FLOW_L_MIN: Blood laboratory measurement: o2 flow l min.
LAB_URINE_POTASSIUM_URINE_MEQ_L: Urine laboratory measurement: potassium urine meq/l.
LAB_URINE_EPITHELIAL_CELLS_HPF: Urine laboratory measurement: epithelial cells hpf.
LAB_URINE_LENGTH_OF_URINE_COLLECTION: Urine laboratory measurement: length of urine collection.
LAB_BLOOD_ALVEOLAR_ARTERIAL_GRADIENT_MM_: Blood laboratory measurement: alveolar arterial gradient mm hg.
LAB_URINE_SODIUM_URINE_MEQ_L: Urine laboratory measurement: sodium urine meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_CREATINE_KINASE_CK_IU_L: Blood laboratory measurement: creatine kinase ck iu/l.
LAB_BLOOD_BASE_EXCESS_MEQ_L: Blood laboratory measurement: base excess meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_FIBRINOGEN_FUNCTIONAL_MG_DL: Blood laboratory measurement: fibrinogen functional mg/dl.
LAB_BLOOD_NUCLEATED_RED_CELLS: Blood laboratory measurement: nucleated red cells.
LAB_BLOOD_CK_MB_INDEX: Blood laboratory measurement: ck mb index.
LAB_BLOOD_CALCULATED_BICARBONATE_WHOLE_B: Blood laboratory measurement: calculated bicarbonate whole blood meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_VITAMIN_B12_PG_ML: Blood laboratory measurement: vitamin b12 pg/ml.
LAB_URINE_CREATININE_URINE_MG_DL: Urine laboratory measurement: creatinine urine mg/dl.
LAB_BLOOD_THYROID_STIMULATING_HORMONE_UU: Blood laboratory measurement: thyroid stimulating hormone uu ml.
LAB_URINE_CHLORIDE_URINE_MEQ_L: Urine laboratory measurement: chloride urine meq/l.
LAB_BLOOD_CHOLESTEROL_TOTAL_MG_DL: Blood laboratory measurement: cholesterol total mg/dl.

LAB_ABN_BLOOD_HEMATOCRIT: Abnormal-flag indicator for blood lab 'hematocrit' (1 if flagged abnormal, 0 otherwise).

LABTXT_BLOOD_INTUBATED: Blood gas comment: intubation status. Encoded as: 0 = NOT INTUBATED, 1 = INTUBATED.
LABTXT_BLOOD_VENTILATOR: Blood gas comment: ventilator mode. Encoded as: 0 = UNKNOWN, 1 = SPONTANEOUS, 2 = CONTROLLED, 3 = IMV (invasive mechanical ventilation).
LABTXT_URINE_BACTERIA: Urine microscopy: semi-quantitative bacteria level. Encoded as: 0 = NONE, 1 = RARE, 2 = FEW, 3 = OCCASIONAL (OCC), 4 = MODERATE (MOD), 5 = ABUNDANT, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_BLOOD: Urine dipstick blood. Encoded as: 0 = NEG, 1 = TRACE (TR), 2 = SMALL (SM), 3 = MODERATE (MOD), 4 = LARGE (LG), 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_EPITHELIAL_CELLS_HPF: Urine epithelial cells per high-power field (HPF). Encoded as: 0 = 0–2, 1 = 3–5, 2 = 6–10, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_GLUCOSE_MG_DL: Urine glucose. Encoded as: 0 = NEGATIVE, 1 = POSITIVE, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_KETONE_MG_DL: Urine ketones. Encoded as: 0 = NEGATIVE, 1 = TRACE (TR), 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_LEUKOCYTES: Urine leukocyte esterase (white cells). Encoded as: 0 = NEG, 1 = TRACE (TR), 2 = SMALL (SM), 3 = MODERATE (MOD), 4 = POSITIVE, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_NITRITE: Urine protein. Encoded as: 0 = NEG, 1 = TRACE (TR), 2 = POSITIVE, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_PROTEIN_MG_DL: Urine protein. Encoded as: 0 = NEG, 1 = TRACE (TR), 2 = POSITIVE, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_RBC_HPF: Urine red blood cells per high-power field (HPF). Encoded as: 0 = 0–2, 1 = 3–5, 2 = 6–10, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_URINE_APPEARANCE: Urine appearance. Encoded as: 0 = CLEAR, 1 = HAZY, 2 = CLOUDY, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_URINE_COLOR: Urine colour. Encoded as: 0 = YELLOW, 1 = STRAW, 2 = AMBER, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_WBC_HPF: Urine white blood cells per high-power field (HPF). Encoded as: 0 = 0–2, 1 = 3–5, 2 = 6–10, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
LABTXT_URINE_YEAST: Urine yeast. Encoded as: 0 = NONE, 1 = RARE, 2 = FEW, 0 also used when UNKNOWN.
